about.aboutText: I am a passionate junior developer with experience in web development oriented technologies such as HTML, CSS, Angular and ASP.NET. Although my background is still short, I have cultivated a solid understanding of these languages and frameworks. My focus is on continuous learning and meeting new challenges. I am excited to grow in the industry, collaborate on inspiring projects and contribute to the development of innovative web solutions
